p: The main keywords used in the search were: “ Colocasia esculenta” OR “taro” OR “poi” combined or not to “tuber” OR “corm” OR “extract” OR “tarin” OR “antitumoral activity” OR “immunomodulatory activity” OR “antidiabetic” OR “anti-hyperlipidemic” OR “antimutagenic” OR “anti-hyperglycemic” OR “anti-hypercholesterolemic” OR “antioxidant”
